definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: I'm not a mama's boy, I can do it by myself.
sentences.chinese: 我並不嬌生慣養，我可以自己做好這個。

sentences.english: Being the youngest and spoilt, my with was granted.
sentences.chinese: 作爲家中的老小被嬌生慣養，我的願望被滿足了。

sentences.english: So top billing should go to deregulating cosseted industries and reforming the labour market.
sentences.chinese: 因此，應該開放那些嬌生慣養產業和改革勞動力市場。

sentences.english: Snuggle down in cosseted support on our Mattress Topper.
sentences.chinese: 依偎在了我們的牀墊禮帽嬌生慣養的支持。

sentences.english: I am afraid that you find a husband who is mama's boy .
sentences.chinese: 他是嬌生慣養的男孩，一個人做不來這個。

sentences.english: He is a mama's boy and he can't live without his mother.
sentences.chinese: 他太嬌生慣養了，離開母親就無法自理生活了。

definition: child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
lit. to drive a duck onto a perch (idiom)/fig. to push sb to do sth way beyond their ability
